602102.name: Interior Resonance
602102.desc: Skill CD and Ultimate Skill CD -35%

602108.name: Melting Pot
602108.desc: ATK +6%. ATK +6% (extra) for each enemy defeated. Cap: 36%

602109.name: Front Guard
602109.desc: DMG taken from the front -25%. DMG taken from other directions +25%

602110.name: Focused Reaction
602110.desc: DMG to locked-on enemies +60%. DMG to not locked-on enemies -15%

602112.name: Destiny's Choice
602112.desc: Obtain a dice and switch between the following 3 effects: Normal Attack DMG +80%; Skill DMG +80%; Ultimate Skill DMG +80%

602115.name: Battlefield Rescue
602115.desc: HP +20% upon launching a normal attack (up to 1 time every 10s)

602119.name: Absolute Control
602119.desc: Zero Time triggered by the team leader +2s

602120.name: Zero Time Super Power
602120.desc: Mods' Crit Rate +100% when in Zero Time triggered by the team leader

602202.name: Power Unleashed
602202.desc: Triggers 1 powerful AoE attack for every 5 normal attacks launched, dealing DMG equal to 200% of ATK and reducing DEF by 30% for 6s.

602203.name: Mobile Refrigeration
602203.desc: Triggers a blizzard when moving, dealing DMG equal to 300% of ATK and inflicting Freeze for 2s.

602204.name: Ravaging Recovery
602204.desc: Restores 20% HP upon defeating an enemy. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 30s.

602205.name: Guide of Wind
602205.desc: When casting skills, gathers enemies together and deals DMG equal to 800% of ATK. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 8s.

602206.name: Intuition Field
602206.desc: Team leader's ATK +30% when there are other allied Mods nearby.

602207.name: Extreme Assistance
602207.desc: When 4 or more enemies are nearby, ATK +20% and Dodge Energy recovery speed +100%.

602208.name: Specialized Measures
602208.desc: DMG to elite enemies and bosses +50%. DMG taken from elite enemies and bosses -10%.

602209.name: Misfortune
602209.desc: DMG to normal enemies -15%. However, there is a 5% chance of immediately defeating normal enemies. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 1s.

602210.name: Overloaded Core
602210.desc: ATK +50%. ATK +5% (extra) upon inflicting DMG. Once this ATK boost reaches 100%, ATK -30% for 4s.

602211.name: Feverish Sputter
602211.desc: Normal Attack also deals a Sputter DMG equal to 50% ATK.

602212.name: Power Jump
602212.desc: Upon triggering Dodge effect, summons a lance to deal DMG equal to 1,400% of ATK. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 8s.

602213.name: Energy Shield
602213.desc: Generates a Shield equal to 8% of HP. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 5s.

602214.name: Concentrated Conversion
602214.desc: DMG +100% when only one skill is in CD as displayed on screen.

602215.name: Healing Converter
602215.desc: This device will be charged when healing. Once fully charged, it deals DMG equal to 2,000% of ATK on surrounding enemies.

602216.name: Power Execution
602216.desc: Tosses a giant hammer straight ahead, inflicting DMG equal to 1,000% ATK and inflicting massive DEF Penetration when Dodge effect is triggered. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 8s.

602301.name: AGI Mecha Repair
602301.desc: Restores 20% HP to all defense towers.

602302.name: Unstable Field
602302.desc: For enemies near the defense tower, reduces their DMG by 10% and Movement SPD by 25%.

602303.name: Stress Interrupt
602303.desc: When defense tower's HP is reduced to 80%, 60%, and 30%, deals DMG equal to 30% of Max HP to all enemies and inflicts Stun on them for 4s, lowering enemies' Movement SPD by 20%.

602304.name: Final Battlefront
602304.desc: When defense tower's HP falls below 20%, DMG dealt by Mods nearby +120%.

602305.name: Periodic Shock
602305.desc: The defense tower sets off a shockwave in the surrounding area every 5s, dealing DMG equal to 15% of HP to enemies hit and inflicting Stun on them for 0.5s.

602306.name: Tough Armor
602306.desc: DMG taken by the defense tower -10%.

602307.name: Limitless Suppression
602307.desc: All attribute RES -40% for 3s for enemies hit by the defense tower.

602308.name: Artillery Loading
602308.desc: Mods surrounding the defense tower have a 20% chance of launching a missile, inflicting DMG equal to 100% of the Mod's ATK.

602309.name: Steadfast Front
602309.desc: ATK +30% for Mods near the defense tower.

602310.name: Emergency Fund
602310.desc: Grants 20 extra coins to all team members each time a Boost is purchased at a defense tower.

602311.name: Financial Support Pact
602311.desc: Grants 30 extra coins to all team members during each readying phase.

602312.name: Thorny Armor
602312.desc: Deals DMG equal to 10% of HP to enemies that attack the defense tower. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 2s.

602313.name: Defense Field Reorganization
602313.desc: Grants the Mod a special field. The Mod and the surrounding Mods take 10%/15%/20%/25%/30% less DMG. When the Mod triggers Zero Time themselves, restores 2%/4%/6%/8%/10% HP to all allied Mods. (Effect increases based on the number of Topology Modules selected)

602314.name: Revolving Field Reorganization
602314.desc: Grants the Mod a special field. The Mod's and the surrounding Mods' Skill CD -10%/15%/20%/25%/30%. When Mods within the field cast skills, randomly resets CD for 1 skill. Effect triggers up to 1 time every 3s. (Effect increases based on the number of Topology Modules selected)

602315.name: Attack Field Reorganization
602315.desc: Grants the Mod a special field. The Mod's and the surrounding Mods' ATK +10%/15%/20%/25%/30%. When the Mod casts the Ultimate Skill, the All-attribute RES of enemies hit -10%/15%/20%/25%/30% for 5s. (Effect increases based on the number of Topology Modules selected)

602316.name: Nightmare
602316.desc: Periodically inflicts Nightmare state on 1 enemy, making them unable to attack or move. Once they are defeated, the state transfers to another enemy.

602317.name: Coexistence
602317.desc: When the defense tower is attacked, there is a 15% chance of transferring the DMG taken to a random Mod nearby. This Mod takes DMG equal to 1% of HP.

602318.name: Continuous Pulse
602318.desc: The defense tower emits an electrical current every 5s. When it hits an enemy, the current will be conducted up to 5 times, dealing DMG on enemies hit equal to 5,000% of tower's ATK.

602319.name: Precise Cutting System
602319.desc: Reduces enemies' Max DEF Penetration stat by 50%.

602401.name: A Price to Pay
602401.desc: Immediately destroys the current defense tower. Mod's CD +30%. Total ATK +120%. Dodge Energy recovery speed +100%. "But... at what cost?"

602402.name: Projection
602402.desc: Defeat enemies to construct these code effects. Scythe Wavers: Chops forward each time Dodge effect is triggered, dealing DMG equal to 1,000% of ATK. Security Forces: Creates a positional attack each time Dodge effect is triggered, dealing DMG equal to 1,200% of ATK. Minotaur: Charges the enemy at the target point each time Dodge effect is triggered, dealing DMG equal to 2,000% of ATK.

602403.name: Fixed Path
602403.desc: When Dodge effect is triggered, locks the currently locked-on enemy, inflicting Stasis on them for 5s. Effect has a 12s CD.

602404.name: Feather of Luck
602404.desc: Become unusually lucky: Activates a judgment each time you take DMG, with a 40% chance of dodging this DMG. Activates a judgment upon each attack, with a 40% chance of triggering a "Slowdown Attack," slowing the target enemy and reducing the DMG dealt by them for 5s.
